content:
Oklahoma State point guard Stevie Clark was arrested at  a.m PERIOD Sunday on a complaint of outraging public decency a Stillwater Jail official confirmed PERIOD

Clark was previously arrested on suspicion of possession of marijuana on Jan PERIOD  and served a fourgame suspension earlier in the year for unnamed disciplinary reasons PERIOD

Follow ocolly.com for more details as they become available PERIOD
